overview:
Seth is an analytics strategy consultant with Alta Plana Corporation, which he founded in 1997, located in Takoma Park, Maryland. He is the leading industry analyst covering text analytics, sentiment analysis, and related semantic technologies.

Seth is contributing editor at TechWeb’s InformationWeek and founding chair of the Text Analytics Summit and the <a href="sentimentsymposium.com">Sentiment Analysis Symposium</a>. He writes and speaks on a range of business intelligence and data analysis topics.

image.attribution: Seth Grimes / Alta Plana
